name: 3 in a Line Tic Tac Toe Game
name_original: 3 in a Line Tic Tac Toe Game
description:
Please Note: This app is free, no IAP, cool gameplay and optimized user interaction.

Change opponents' pieces and use against them in this ultimate advanced Tic Tac Toe version!

The objective of this game is simple: Be the first player to put three identical pieces in a row. There's only one problem: your opponent can change your pieces and use them against you!

The game is played in turns. You can play against AI or against another person.

If it is your turn, tap an empty square to place a new piece or tap any existing piece to upgrade it.

You may tap more than once, but each turn you may change only one square.

You can also change your opponent's pieces! When you're done making your move, tap "Next Turn" or submit your move.

It's like Tic-tac-toe... but much harder! Play against AI or another person, or watch AI play itself. Different sequence themes to choose from...


Game Features :-

* Awesome gameplay
* Clean UI
* Multiple themes to choose from
* Nice music and sound effects
* Cool animations
* Play with AI or with your friends
* No IAP, free and much more....

Connect 3 pieces in a row and have fun in this challenging tic tac toe board game....
